Method Detail

login

SessionDTO login(com.isotrol.impe3.pms.ext.api.Credentials credentials)
                 throws PMSException
Starts a new session.

Parameters:
credentials - User credentials.
Returns:
The new session if successful, null if not.
Throws:
LockedUserException - if the user is locked.
InactiveUserException - if the user is inactive.
PMSException

logout

void logout()
Ends the current session.

SessionDTO getSession()
Returns the current session information.

Returns:
The current session information, or null if there is no current session.

boolean checkLocale(String locale)
                    throws PMSException
Checks whether a provided locale string would be accepted.

Parameters:
locale - Locale to check.
Returns:
True if the locale is valid.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
PMSException

checkLocales

Set<String> checkLocales(Iterable<String> locales)
                         throws PMSException
Checks whether some provided locale strings would be accepted.

Parameters:
locales - Locales to check.
Returns:
The set of invalid locales. Never null.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null or any of the locales is null.
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
PMSException

checkURI

boolean checkURI(String uri,
                 boolean mustBeAbsolute)
                 throws PMSException
Checks whether a provided URI string would be accepted.

Parameters:
uri - URI to check.
mustBeAbsolute - True if the URIs must be absolute to be considered valid.
Returns:
True if the URI is valid.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
PMSException

checkURIs

                      boolean mustBeAbsolute)
                      throws PMSException
Checks whether some provided URI strings would be accepted.

Parameters:
uris - URIs to check.
mustBeAbsolute - True if the URIs must be absolute to be considered valid.
Returns:
The set of invalid URIs. Never null.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null or any of the locales is null.
AuthorizationException - if not authorized to perform the operation.
PMSException
